non_compliant.section: The T&Cs, as well as the information and material included in any page of the Website may be changed or updated without notice.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, transparency and modalities; Lawfulness of processing; General principles for processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that any changes to the T&Cs will be communicated to users in a timely manner, allowing them to review the changes and withdraw consent if necessary.

non_compliant.section: In addition, when using particular Faraday owned or operated services, you and Faraday shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services, which may be posted and modified from time to time.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, transparency and modalities; Lawfulness of processing; General principles for processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify that any changes to guidelines or rules for specific services will be communicated to users in advance, providing them with the opportunity to understand the changes and exercise their rights accordingly.
